dublin_core.dcvalue: New models of psychiatric intervention are needed to improve the accessibility of mental health care in the primary care setting particularly in rural areas of the United States and especially for children and adolescents The aim of this study was to examine the diagnostic characteristics and outcomes for children referred for eMental Health consultations at UC Davis videoconferencing telephone and secure e mail from 10 primary care clinics in rural northern California
Journal of the American Academy of Child and Adolescent Psychiatry
A retrospective analysis of a child and adolescent eMental Health program.
